testimonialsForHome.quote: "The mock tests helped me pass JLPT N2 on my first attempt. The detailed answer explanations were invaluable!"
"Thanks to the business Japanese course, I secured a job at a major Japanese IT company!"

sswExam.title: Care Worker Skill Examination
sswExam.description: Assess practical skills and knowledge related to elderly care, including body care, daily life support, and communication. This exam is crucial for those aiming to work in elderly care facilities in Japan.

sswExam.title: Building Cleaning Skill Measurement Test
sswExam.description: This exam evaluates your abilities in building cleaning techniques, including floor, window cleaning, and waste disposal.  Essential for roles maintaining commercial and residential building cleanliness.

sswExam.title: Machining Skill Examination
sswExam.description: Focuses on skills in operating and maintaining machine tools to cut and shape metal parts. This exam is for those working in manufacturing facilities producing machine components.

sswExam.title: Welding Skill Examination
sswExam.description: Tests your proficiency in various welding techniques and safety procedures.  A key exam for those in manufacturing and construction sectors requiring welding expertise.

sswExam.title: Industrial Sheet Metal Work Skill Examination
sswExam.description: Evaluates your ability to fabricate and assemble products from sheet metal. Relevant for industries producing enclosures, ductwork, and other sheet metal components.

sswExam.title: Formwork Carpentry Skill Examination
sswExam.description: Assesses your skills in constructing temporary molds (formwork) for concrete structures.  Crucial for building foundations, walls, and other concrete elements in construction projects.

sswExam.title: Reinforced Steel Bar Construction Skill Examination
sswExam.description: Tests your ability to assemble and place reinforcing steel bars within concrete structures to enhance their strength.  Vital for ensuring structural integrity in buildings and infrastructure.

sswExam.title: Shipbuilding Welding Skill Examination
sswExam.description: Specialized welding exam focusing on techniques and standards specific to shipbuilding. For welders working in shipyards and marine engineering.

sswExam.title: Automobile Repair and Maintenance Skill Examination
sswExam.description: Covers diagnostics, repair, and maintenance of automobiles.  Essential for mechanics and technicians working in automotive service centers and garages.

sswExam.title: Ground Handling Skill Examination
sswExam.description: Focuses on procedures and safety in ground support operations at airports, including baggage handling, aircraft servicing, and passenger assistance.

sswExam.title: Aircraft Maintenance Skill Examination
sswExam.description: Examines knowledge and skills in maintaining aircraft systems and components to ensure airworthiness. For aircraft mechanics and maintenance engineers.

sswExam.title: Accommodation Skill Examination
sswExam.description: Covers front desk operations, guest services, and hospitality skills necessary for working in hotels and other accommodation facilities.

sswExam.title: Food and Beverage Manufacturing Skill Measurement Test
sswExam.description: Evaluates skills in food processing, hygiene, quality control, and packaging within food and beverage production environments.

sswExam.title: Food Service Industry Skill Examination
sswExam.description: Tests proficiency in restaurant service, cooking basics, hygiene practices, and customer interaction in the food service industry.

sswExam.title: Cultivation Management Skill Examination
sswExam.description: Focuses on crop cultivation techniques, vegetable farming, and agricultural management practices.

sswExam.title: Livestock Management Skill Examination
sswExam.description: Covers skills in livestock care, dairy farming, poultry farming, and animal husbandry.

sswExam.title: Fishery Skill Examination
sswExam.description: Evaluates skills in fishing techniques, net handling, seafood processing, and marine resource management.

sswExam.title: Aquaculture Skill Examination
sswExam.description: Focuses on fish farming, shellfish farming, and aquaculture management practices.
